description.line1: The cases in this list have yet to be submitted to HM Courts & Tribunals Service.
description.line2: If you wish to edit an application for appeal, please select ‘edit’ next to the appropriate application.
description.line3: If you no longer wish to submit any of these applications for appeal, please select ‘archive’ next to the appropriate application.
description.line4: If you wish to submit a new appeal, please select ‘create new application’ to provide your appeal information.

buttons.warnMessage: Are you sure you want to archive your appeal application? You will not be able to retrieve your application once it is archived.
